contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Software | name = Combustion | screenshot = <!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Combustion.png|250px]] -->| caption = Combustion 4 | developer = [[Autodesk Media and Entertainment]] | latest_release_version = 2008 | operating_system = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Mac OS X]] | genre = [[Digital video]] [[compositing|compositor]] | license = [[Proprietary software|Proprietary]] | website = http://usa.autodesk.com | }} '''Combustion 2008''' is the newest version of Autodesk's visual effects and compositing software tool. Combustion is a [[computer program]] "for motion graphics, compositing and [[visual effects]]" (Discreet, n.d.). The software [[retail]]s for [[US$]]995 ([[MacMinute]], 2004). It is commonly likened to Adobe's [[After Effects]], and shares a timeline based interface with [[Autodesk]]'s (formerly ''Discreet'') higher-end compositing systems Inferno, Flame and Flint. This is in contrast to the node based interface used by some other compositing applications. Since the release of version 2, Combustion includes both node view and time line views. It has since been replaced by Toxik, which is now called Composite. ==See also== Competitors to Combustion include [[After Effects]]; [[Blender (software)|Blender]], [[Apple Inc.|Apple's]] [[Shake (software)|Shake]] and [[Apple Motion|Motion]]; [[eyeon Fusion]]; [[Nuke (software)|The Foundry's Nuke]]; Boris RED; Pinnacle Commotion; and FXHome HitFilm. == References == * [http://usa.autodesk.com/adsk/servlet/pc/index?siteID=123112&id=5562397 Autodesk Combustion Official site] * Discreet.
